title: 'He was in central leadership compound in heart of Tehran': IDF issues statement on Khamenei's death
summary_full: The Israeli military confirmed a large-scale operation killed Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei in Tehran.  The IDF stated Khamenei was responsible for years of repression and aimed to destroy Israel, leading a terror axis.  His elimination marks the end of a significant chapter, according to the military.  Iran's government acknowledged the US-Israeli strikes shortly after.
